articles.author: Dee-Ann Durbin, Mae Anderson
articles.title: US wine shops and importers say Trump's threatened 200% tariff on European wines would kill demand - The Associated Press
articles.description: The U.S. is suddenly looking less bubbly for European wines. President Donald Trump on Thursday threatened a 200% tariff on European wine, Champagne and spirits if the European Union goes forward with a planned 50% tariff on American whiskey. Wine sellers and…
articles.content:

articles.author: Mounira Elsamra
articles.title: European region sees highest number of measles cases in 25 years, WHO says - CNN
articles.description: Measles cases in the European region surged last year to reach their highest levels since 1997, the World Health Organization and the UN’s children agency, UNICEF, said Thursday.
articles.content:

articles.title: EU Poised to Back Extension of Sanctions on Russian Tycoons - Bloomberg
articles.description: European Union member states agreed to extend sanctions on individual Russians, including a number of billionaires, after Hungary dropped its opposition.
